page.title: 12LAND RECLAMATION
page.content: At Bulwer Avenue in St.Sampson's a large reclamation project has taken place in recent years.Land has been {reclaimed from the sea}as a means of providing more industrial sites. A large baling plant was set up behind the fuel tanks, and from July 1982 until Spring of 1985{household refuse was baled and used to infill an area enclosed by a 460 metre long wall. Approximately 210,000 lorry loads of household refuse was baled, and a total of 100,000 tons of stone was used. It is hoped to use this reclaimed area for the{ship building industry as they hope to install a slipway there to launch the new boats straight into the sea from the factory.
